content:
Use the same basic concepts to explain why the relationship between China and the west cannot be described as a simple or straightforward "free trade zone". The central focus is on how to communicate this as well as the implications for the Chinese economic relationship.

China, Russia and other countries in the North Pacific have already been affected by US-backed and North Korean-sponsored efforts to impose sanctions. With the collapse of the Soviet Union, the US has shown that it does not need and will not rely on its allies for support. This is the primary reason why Washington has refused to support a resolution to the crisis of North Korea. Instead, it is offering its support to a North American, European and Asian group that is pushing for an end to North Vietnam.
